meanings.definition: Not skilled or knowledgeable in a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: She felt unexpert in painting, so she decided to take a beginner's class.
meanings.sent2: The unexpert chef burned the toast because he forgot to set a timer.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unexpertise in gardening, he tried to grow tomatoes in his backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpert hands struggled to tie the intricate knot.
meanings.sent5: The unexpert swimmer flailed in the water, unable to stay afloat.

meanings.sent1: The unexpert driver hesitated at every turn, unsure of the correct route.
meanings.sent2: Being unexpert in public speaking, she felt nervous before her presentation.
meanings.sent3: His unexpert handling of the situation only made things worse.
meanings.sent4: The unexpert photographer's pictures came out blurry due to shaky hands.
meanings.sent5: The unexpert hiker got lost in the woods after straying from the trail.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of skill or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The unexpert repairman made the problem worse by using the wrong tools.
meanings.sent2: Her unexpert attempt at knitting resulted in a tangled mess of yarn.
meanings.sent3: The unexpert magician's tricks were easily deciphered by the audience.
meanings.sent4: He felt unexpert in the art of negotiation, often giving in too easily.
meanings.sent5: The unexpert driver stalled the car multiple times trying to shift gears.
